name: Sequence Shirt
description:
## Sequence Shirt

The ultimate wearable for those who want to show their love for crypto and the Sequence platform. Available through special events.

### Bumpkins.io

Deposit this wearable in Sunflower Land to equip it on your Bumpkin

### About

Bumpkins is a community driven customisable NFT project powered by Sunflower Land
[Bumpkins](https://docs.bumpkins.io/getting-started/about)
